title: Lesson 74
paragraph: Direction and mode guide navigation and behavior. Awareness of artifacts, norms, and operational methods ensures efficiency and safety.

words.meaning: to position or align relative to points
words.japaneseMeaning: 方向付ける、適応させる
words.example: He oriented the map toward north.

words.meaning: a particular way or manner of doing something
words.example: The device has several operating modes.
The earthquake was a national tragedy.
He backed the team in every decision.

words.meaning: to honor or observe with festivities
words.example: They celebrated their victory with a party.
It is the norm to greet colleagues in the morning.

words.meaning: to come together or fulfill requirements
words.example: They met for a discussion on the project.
